title: AFK framed... once again... the dilema...
body:
The eternal afk probation dilema... kill me for not having a top notch pc that never fails or the power to control my internet connection fails at all times... cm'on ... i have "donne" the penalty ... waited all those sikning 20 min x5 ... and when i finaly get over it once more... a player wich just simply gives up... and stays put on base...pouting... coming up with storys and making me the bad guy in the eyes of the enemy team, for coming in game 5 min late (connection problems...still i came and played) get's me yet another blissfull 5 round of 20 min wait ... like... seriously ... wtf?!?!?!?
The problem is not having it controlled... as in for the "why" it happened... in this particular case... as soon as i got on the game (sup), i went there... i helped my team... what was he (top) doing?... just afk chating with the enemy team, being toxic... it's not bcause of 5 MINUTES THAT U LOSE A GAME... but the result was...? me having to wait 20min*5 ... if u guys are trying to make me quit on this... congrats on the great job ... really working wonders... bacuse of childish behaviours like the one the "teemo" on my team played... the game really gets tyring ... 
I know the game sometimes freezes and my connection sometimes simply drops (some days it works perfectly... some it's a nightmare, and on those after 1 game or 2 if i fell i can get luchy ... i just give up and log off)... but this is too much... i enjoy the game for a fun few min or hours...to simply have fun, and knowing that those problems may happen (alldow i don't fully understand why) i just play normal mode (meaning not ranked) and aram... bcause i don't want to ruin anyone ranked games... 
If u doubt me that much...check the "gg's" i get ... compared to the afk's ... plus... logical thinking ... if i just spent 100 min waiting to play... on probation... why, just why the hell would i go afk on the first "out of probation" game, go afk once again? to just trow away another full 100min waiting ... like it's a hobie to wait...endlesly...and just waist time...does that make sence to anyone... ANYONE?
Correct me if i'm wrong... but this game still is supose to entertain and let people have fun... right?!
But even being considered about others...what have i got in return? A kid tantrum in a single game... and i'm put back in detention ... have it in concideration for a bit please... it is a game for children and adults... still... let's have some conscience riot... will u?
I am sure this is just one of many cases of unfortunate palyers like myself... i hate the childish coment's and haters and toxic players... what do i do... i ignore them... i'm old enough to know better... but this is waaaay beiond my pacience limit ... 
Can we, the conection and full of lag problem players... with old pc's... still have a good time here?
I wonder... :(

replies.body: Kill you for not having a top notch pc? Nah just prevent you from playing online with a team because your internet is unstable. Stop being so dramatic. The punishment fits the crime.

Dramatic or not (on your opinion) it doesn't happen all the time, the problem i'm pointing here is: 
I had 2 day's with no problem at all, played another one just now, and guess what? It crashed ... result? one sigle toxic player reported afk, aldow we won and i was there 97% of the game time ... and i'm back to the 20 min wait ... because of 1 player who just for teh fun of it... decided to report ...  
It amases me that this actually makes sence to some people ... 
But then again... guess it only "hurts" when u are the one that fell.  

" The punishment fits the crime." ... after 6 or 7 games smooth sailing ... 1 crash = 1 report = 5 games with the 20 min extra wait ... uau... u must have a lot of time to spend and an the chillest patience lvl ... if that is "fitted". Go zen!! ;)

And when everything u try still doesn't work it out? 
If not to take out or reduce the penalties...it would be great to at least have some more rules on geting the penalty it self... 

I've been playing for years now, and never got problems with being afk, up until recently... now i seem to ALLWAYS be on probation! 
My pc craches once... i have 5x20 min of wait
A toxic player decides to give up, but...since i came in 2 min later (slow log, bites me the reason why it randomly happens - probably the pc itself) and i'm the one with 5x20min of waiting, again.
I play 5 good games (no crash, no delay, no lag...) then have one crash, and BAM ... 5x20min of wait.

I have had afk players on my team too...everybody has been there... some we don't know why, some are just trolling, others go afk for the sake of it, get bored, give up, leave the game bcause of 1001 reasons. And it sucks... i know!
But wouldn't it be great to be able to separate those who go bcause they choose to, from those who were just going to play a game to have fun and something wrong happens out of their control that ends up with 100 min lost on queue?! 

Plus, if we been there, and waited the all 5x20min ... to get to play a game... isn't it obvious that we didn't do it in purpose, and that we really want to play this game?

A warning at least intead of instant penalty for 1x ou 2x ... then the penaty, for example;

De "GG" counting to reduce the time on the probation if given from non premade teamplayers;

Or having difrent time penalties for the game tipe. Since it is way more sirious if on ranked matches than on the normal or aram;

Adding a report for AFK on purpose/by choice and one for unvoluntairy AFK to difirenciate us;

Get the afk to play with each other for God sake... maybe we will even form afk teams for the ones who do not go afk by choice, and end those toxic coments and all the reporting thing.
That way we would be understanding with each other's ... not simply hate and look at our belly buttons ONLY! And be able to enjoy this game once again. #wishfullthinking :p

AFK players, because of out of your control problems ... reach out  ^^
